it-ticket-creation-message: Access the ticket management system at website (https://eiti.node.ai/) add all this new tickets into our system with Browser Agent: ’’ Affected User: Alice Johnson Assignment Group: Software Services Team Assigned To: Michael Brown Priority: 4 – Low | Urgency: 3 – Medium | Impact: 4 – Low Affected Service: Software Services Issue: Application Performance Degradation Description: The affected user reports slow response times and intermittent timeouts when accessing internal software applications during normal business hours. ‘’ Once done, check the incoming tickets and generate a detailed statistical report analyzing which IT areas have the most issues and the highest financial impact. The report should include charts and diagrams for visualization.
bank-transfer-csv-analysis-and-visualiza: Bank Transfer CSV Analysis and Visualization
Create a mock bank transfer CSV file include 10 columns and 10 rows. Read the generated CSV file and summarize the data, generate a chart to visualize relevant trends or insights from the data.
